1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Salamah bin Qais narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "When you perform Wudu then sniff water in the nose and blow it out, and when you use small stones (to remove filth) then make it odd (numbered)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمَضْمَضَةِ وَالاِسْتِنْشَاقِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Al-Madmadah And AI-Istinshaq
